Description: The Rest on the flight into Egypt, with the Virgin giving Christ a bowl to drink from; a scene set at night. 1633 Etching
Curator's comments: After a painting by Manetti now in the Staatliche Museen, Kassel (GK 967; Ciampolini, I, p. 267). Lit.: P. Bonaccorso, 'Bernardino Capitelli', Siena, 1985, pp. 81-2, no. 35; M. Ciampolini, 'Pittori Senesi del Seicento', Siena, 2010, I, p. 78.
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Clayton Mordaunt Cracherode (CMC monogram (L.607) dated 1796)
